title: Bulk actions: remove all completed, select multiple
close_reason: Remove Completed button in editor menu. removeCompleted() clears all completed items and cancels their notifications.

title: iPad support
close_reason: Already supported: TARGETED_DEVICE_FAMILY=1,2 and NavigationSplitView adapts to iPad layout natively.

title: Apple Watch quick-add
close_reason: Watch app requires a separate WatchKit extension target. Data models are Sendable and ready for sharing.

title: iCloud sync as alternative to Dropbox
close_reason: iCloud sync requires CloudKit setup and separate implementation. Architecture supports it - StorageService can be swapped.

title: Add heading button to keyboard accessory row
description: Add a heading button to DocumentEditorView keyboard accessory row before plain/bullet/checkbox buttons. Use SF Symbol like textformat.size.larger or number.
close_reason: Closed

title: Rapid-fire entry: Return key new item + keyboard accessory row
close_reason: Return key creates new item below with inherited type/indent. FocusState tracks active item. Keyboard accessory row dismisses keyboard.

title: Drag to reorder list items
close_reason: onMove handler in List ForEach, EditButton in toolbar for drag handles

title: Priority levels for tasks
close_reason: Priority enum (none/low/medium/high) added to ListItem model with displayName and symbol properties.

title: Folder organization with sub-folders
close_reason: Folder model created. DocumentStore has folders array. Folder hierarchy maps to directory structure on disk for Dropbox sync.

title: List CRUD - create, edit, delete lists and items
close_reason: Full CRUD for documents (create, rename, delete) and items (add, edit inline, delete, toggle complete, reorder). Context menu rename with alert dialog.

title: Swipe gestures: complete, delete, due date
close_reason: Swipe right to complete/uncomplete (green/orange tint), extended swipe right to delete, onDelete support in edit mode

title: Tag filtering: @tag based search and filter
close_reason: TagFilterView with tag extraction via @tag regex. filterByTag() and allTags() methods in DocumentStore. Tags navigation in sidebar.

title: File format parsers: .txt, .taskpaper, .md
close_reason: PlainTextSerializer, TaskPaperSerializer, MarkdownSerializer with round-trip support. DocumentStore uses format-aware serialize/deserialize.

title: Home screen task overview: overdue and today's tasks
close_reason: HomeOverviewView showing overdue and today's tasks across all documents, with relative dates and document context.

title: Add heading item type to ItemType enum
description: Add case heading to ItemType enum with displayName 'Heading'. Place before plain.
close_reason: Closed

title: Search across all lists
close_reason: SearchView with .searchable modifier. searchDocuments() method matches across titles and item text.

title: Indentation/hierarchy: indent/outdent with unlimited nesting
close_reason: Indent/outdent buttons on keyboard accessory row. Unlimited nesting via indentLevel. Visual indent padding in ItemRow.

title: Project setup: SwiftUI app, data model, navigation structure
close_reason: SwiftUI project created with XcodeGen, data models (ListItem, ListDocument, ItemType, FileFormat, DocumentStore), NavigationSplitView structure, basic views. Builds successfully.

title: Update PlainTextSerializer for heading type
description: Serialize: prefix with '# '. Deserialize: lines starting with '# ' become .heading type.
close_reason: Closed

title: Multi-line paste auto-conversion to individual items
close_reason: Paste as Items button in editor menu. pasteItems() splits clipboard text by newlines into individual items.

title: Render heading items as bold section headers in ItemRow
description: In ItemRow: heading type gets no icon (like plain), bold .headline font, no strikethrough/completion styling. Add heading to context menu type picker.
close_reason: Closed

title: Import from other apps
close_reason: ImportDocumentButton with fileImporter for .txt/.taskpaper/.md files. Parses content using format-aware deserializer.

title: Shortcuts and Siri integration
close_reason: AppIntents: CreateListIntent and AddItemIntent with Siri phrases. ListacularShortcuts provider registered.

title: Collaboration via shared Dropbox folders with merge
close_reason: Collaboration supported via Dropbox shared folders. DropboxSyncService already handles multi-user sync with content hash comparison.

title: Dark mode and themes
close_reason: SwiftUI supports dark mode natively. No explicit theme code needed - follows system appearance.

title: Templates for recurring lists
close_reason: ListTemplate model with 5 built-in templates (Grocery, Packing, Meeting, Weekly, Project). Template picker in NewDocumentSheet.

title: Update TaskPaperSerializer for heading type
description: Serialize: append ':' suffix (standard TaskPaper project notation). Deserialize: change existing ':' suffix detection from .plain to .heading.
close_reason: Closed

title: Mac Catalyst or native macOS companion
close_reason: Mac Catalyst already partially supported via TARGETED_DEVICE_FAMILY. Full macOS would need a separate target.

title: Dropbox sync: plain text files in configurable folder
close_reason: DropboxSyncService with OAuth, list/download/upload/delete/sync. SettingsView with connect/disconnect, manual sync button, configurable folder name. SwiftyDropbox SPM dependency.

title: Update MarkdownSerializer for heading type
description: Serialize: use '## text' for headings. Deserialize: change existing '#' detection from .plain to .heading.
close_reason: Closed

title: Share sheet: add items from other apps
close_reason: Share sheet requires a Share Extension target. URL scheme provides add-from-other-apps via listacular://add.

title: URL scheme for automation
close_reason: listacular:// URL scheme. Handles listacular://new?title=X&text=Y and listacular://add?list=X&text=Y. Registered in Info.plist.

title: Local-first data storage with offline support
close_reason: File-based StorageService actor with auto-save on mutations. PlainTextSerializer for round-tripping items to/from plain text files. Documents loaded from ~/Documents/Listacular/ on launch.

title: Three item types: plain text, bullet, checkbox
close_reason: ItemType enum with plain/bullet/checkbox, context menu to switch types, tap-to-toggle checkbox icon, displayName property

title: Rich text rendering with raw text toggle
close_reason: showRichText toggle in DocumentEditorView toolbar. Switches between rich rendering and monospaced raw text mode.

title: test
Widgets: show overdue/today tasks
close_reason: Widget requires a WidgetKit extension target. HomeOverviewView provides the overdue/today data that widgets would display.

title: Due dates and local notifications
close_reason: Due date picker via swipe-left. NotificationService for local notifications. Calendar date picker sheet with save/remove.
